full_summary:
# National Capital Region (NCR) Temporary Help Services Requirement

## Background

The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Temporary Help Services under the Supply Arrangement (SA) for the National Capital Region (NCR). This requirement is open to SA holders who qualified under Stream 13, Policy and Advisory Services, Category 13.6 Risk Management.

## Eligibility

The RFP is restricted to SA holders under EN578-172870 who meet the specified qualification criteria. The following SA holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Action Personnel of Ottawa-Hull Ltd
* Akkada Professional Services and Zernam Enterprise in JV
* ARTEMP Personnel Services Inc
* Axons Canada Inc, Levio Conseils Inc, IN JOINT VENTURE
* BP & M Government IM & IT Consulting Inc
* Cache Computer Consulting Corp
* Cistel Technology Inc
* IPSS INC
* Lionel Drouin
* MAKWA Resourcing Inc
* NATTIQ INC
* Northern Brainwaves Consulting Inc
* OLAV CONSULTING CORP, MOSHWA ABORIGINAL INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION, IN JOINT VENTURE
* RHEA INC
* TEKSYSTEMS CANADA CORP/SOCIÉTÉ TEKSYSTEMS CANADA

## Description of the Requirement

The DND requires Temporary Help Services, including resources with a minimum security level of Secret, to support their operations. The proposed services will be used to provide various support functions, including risk management.

## Notice Details

* Reference Number: cb-9275-79597923
* Amendment Number: 4
* Publication Date: 2023-09-20
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-09-26T11:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-09-26
* Expected Contract Start Date: Not specified
* Expected Contract End Date: Not specified
* Tender Status: Expired
* Notice Type: RFP against Supply Arrangement
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Variations or combinations of the above methods
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Regions of Opportunity: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact CFSG
